Title: Relates to financial exploitation of a vulnerable elderly person
Summary: Relates to establishing the crime of financial exploitation of a vulnerable elderly person or a person with a disability and provides for civil liability for financial exploitation of a vulnerable elderly person.
LawCode: Add Art 262 §§262.00 - 262.35, Pen L; add §11-108, Gen Ob L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to establishing the crime of financial exploitation of a vulnerable elderly person or a person with a disability; and to amend the general obligations law, in relation to civil liability for financial exploitation of a vulnerable elderly person
